Class ec.meta.StdClaLoader 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.meta.StdObj
           |
           +----ec.meta.StdClaLoader
public class StdClaLoader
extends StdObj
implements ClaLoader
This is the standard implementation of the ec.meta.ClaLoader interface. This is the out-of-vat implementation. There is a different in-vat implementation, which, in particular, does not grant implicit authority to the CLASSPATH.

StdClaLoader()
Create a StdClaLoader with implicit authority to load classes from the Java CLASSPATH.

getDeflectorCla()
Override of method from ec.meta.Obj.
loadClass(String)
Implementation of method from ec.meta.ClaLoader.
